```{ojs}
//| echo: false
//| output: false

name=Array()
data = FileAttachment("data/items_meta.json").json()
pis=data.pis

{ for(let i=0;i<pis.length;i++){
    name[i]=pis[i].name
    }
  return name
}
```

## Row

```{ojs}

viewof pi = Inputs.select(name,{value:name[1], label: "Choose PI" });
indx=name.indexOf(pi)

viewof last = Inputs.button("Last Year",{value: pis[indx].last_year, label: "Download Last Year's data", reduce: () => window.open("https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/"+pis[indx].last_year,"_blank")})
```
